page.title: 09STANWICK DIGS
page.content:
{THE DIGS AT STANWICK
In Stanwick there is a field in which there have been found remains of Stanwick's early inhabitants. The excavations were conducted in 1984 and 1985.So far a huge Roman mosaic has been found and archaeologists are trying to piece it togethers. {ARTIFACTS AND OTHER FINDS} A large amount of varied finds were found during the excavation.The vast majority of these finds were bones,coins and pottery.Many coins are corroded but with the help of X-rays their original form can be found.
